properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO ,CATEGORY_NO ,BOARD_TITLE ,USER_ID ,COUNT ,CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
